metadata.title: cozymori — AI Observability Framework
metadata.description: Simpler, Easier, For Developers. VectorWave and VectorSurfer — observability, caching, and self-healing for AI functions.

intro.headline: Observe. Cache. Heal.
intro.sub: Vectorize and trace every function call. Cache similar requests instantly. When errors occur, AI diagnoses them and opens a fix PR — automatically.

vectorwave.title: Python vectorizing framework
vectorwave.description: One decorator to vectorize and trace your functions. Semantic caching, self-healing, drift detection — an AI observability framework powered by Weaviate.

vectorsurf.title: AI observability dashboard
vectorsurf.description: Execution timelines, distributed traces, and AI-powered error diagnosis in one dashboard. Monitor all your VectorWave data in real-time.

philosophy.title: What we believe
philosophy.simpleBody: No complex setup — one decorator is all you need. Every API is designed to work right out of the box.
philosophy.openBody: All our work is open-source. The best tools emerge when ideas flow freely and communities build together.
philosophy.devBody: We obsess over developer experience. Focus on what you're building — we'll handle the rest.

ecosystem.title: One ecosystem
ecosystem.sub: From decorator to dashboard to testing. Everything connects.
ecosystem.vectorcheckDesc: CLI regression testing for AI functions. Compare outputs with vector similarity and LLM judges.
ecosystem.vectorsurferstlDesc: Lightweight Streamlit dashboard. Start monitoring with just Python — no setup required.

cta.title: Let's build together.
cta.description: All our projects are open-source. Read the docs or start contributing on GitHub.

vectorwave.heroDescription: A decorator-based Python framework. Vectorize function calls, store them in Weaviate, and get semantic caching, self-healing, and drift detection.
vectorwave.apiTitle: One decorator is all you need
vectorwave.apiDescription: Trace and cache your functions with a single decorator. Supports both sync and async.
vectorwave.featuresDescription: Everything you need for AI function observability.
vectorwave.feature1Description: Similar inputs are detected via vector similarity and return cached results instantly. Drastically cut LLM costs and latency.
vectorwave.feature2Description: When errors occur, AI analyzes logs and source code, generates a fix, and opens a GitHub PR automatically.
vectorwave.feature3Description: PyO3-based Rust native extension handles batch writes and sensitive data masking asynchronously.
vectorwave.feature4Description: trace_id and span_id based distributed tracing. Track function call chains hierarchically.
vectorwave.feature5Description: Monitor input vector distance from Golden Dataset centroid. Instant webhook alerts on anomalies.
vectorwave.feature6Description: Natural language Q&A over stored code and trace logs. Explore your codebase with AI.
vectorwave.ctaDescription: pip install vectorwave and start AI function observability in minutes.

vectorsurf.heroDescription: A full-stack dashboard for monitoring all your VectorWave data in real-time. Built with Next.js and FastAPI.
vectorsurf.demoDescription: View KPIs, timelines, and error distributions on a single Bento grid layout.
vectorsurf.codeDescription: Feed error logs and source code to GPT-4 for automatic diagnosis and fix generation.
vectorsurf.featuresDescription: Everything you need for AI observability in one dashboard.
vectorsurf.feature1Description: Drag-and-drop responsive dashboard with widgets. KPIs, timelines, and error distributions at a glance.
vectorsurf.feature2Description: Visualize distributed traces as a waterfall. Spot bottlenecks and errors in function call chains instantly.
vectorsurf.feature3Description: GPT-4 powered error diagnosis. Analyze errors individually or in batch and get suggested code fixes.
vectorsurf.feature4Description: Replay past successful executions for regression testing. Supports exact match and semantic comparison modes.
vectorsurf.feature5Description: Search functions, execution logs, and errors with natural language. Hybrid search and RAG Q&A supported.
vectorsurf.feature6Description: English, Japanese, and Korean UI out of the box. A multilingual dashboard for global teams.
vectorsurf.ctaDescription: Monitor everything about your AI functions with VectorSurfer.

footer.description: Simpler, Easier, For Developers. Open-source frameworks for AI observability.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.description: Welcome to the cozymori documentation. Learn how to use VectorWave and VectorSurfer in your projects.
docs.emptyMessage: Documentation pages will appear here. Check back soon!
